game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.description: The legend says that the treasure is hidden deep in the jungle, guarded by dangerous creatures and traps.

task.objective: Gather information about the treasure's location from the village elder
task.description: The elder lives in the village near the entrance to the jungle. He might know something about the treasure and its guardians.

task.objective: Obtain a map of the jungle from the local cartographer
task.description: The cartographer has a detailed map of the jungle and the known locations of dangerous creatures. It will help you navigate through the jungle safely.

task.objective: Find and defeat the guardians of the treasure
task.description: The guardians are powerful creatures that protect the treasure from thieves. Defeating them will allow you to reach the treasure.
task.location: Deep in the jungle, near the Lost City of El Dorado
